amendment.description: Amendment increases the appropriation for the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) of the Treasury Department by $15 million offset by a $15 million reduction from the GSA Rent Account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-208 to increase the appropriation for the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) of the Treasury Department by $15 million and offsets from the GSA Rent Account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
